data.name: BOOOOOOOOOOBS
data.detailed_description:
BOOOOOOOOOOBS is a match 3 puzzle game with many levels and cute boobs. No matter what size is your preference, you'll find the right one in our collection. Big boobs and small tits, big nipples and perky nipples, whatever you pick out, you will have a nice time playing!

We took some awesome tits in all shapes, putting them together and giving you a nice and awesome matching game with tits only!

- Match anywhere to swap two adjacent pieces and make 3 or more in a line to clear them and complete the level.
- Explore many different locations with various boob sizes.
- Feel free to stare at the boobs as much as you want, and wipe away all your stress!

Features:

- Hyper-polished match-3 gameplay with a custom built-from-scratch implmenetation.
- Perfect for short sessions or extended play.
- Beautiful boobs of all shapes and sizes.
- Clearing a level unlocks a new boobs picture.
- Relaxing soundtrack.
- Visual novel elements before and after each game.
- Failure to progress is also progress.
- Choices during dialogue affect gameplay.

Rules of the match 3:

- You must match 3 or more of the same gems in a row or column.
- Each gem type has a different meaning and effect.
- You must keep an eye on your exam points as well as remaining turns counter.
- You must "defeat" the opponent - your examiner - by matching heart symbols and seducing her.
- You can also use skills to alter the game. But be careful, they only have limited amount of uses!

In BOOOOOOOOOOBS the only thing you'll experience is pure joy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Contains images of sexually explicit content and nudity.
